role.argrole: thing arg0 has courage to do

example.parse: (IP (ADVP (AD 甚至)) (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VSB (VV 出外) (VV 求学)))) (DEC 的))) (NP-PN (NR 美浓)) (NP (NN 子弟))) (VP (ADVP (AD 也)) (ADVP (AD 因此)) (VP (VP (VV 勇於) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (PU 「) (VV 现身) (PU 」)))) (PU ，) (VP (VV 投入) (NP-OBJ (NN 抗争) (NN 运动))))))
example.arg: *OP* *T*-1 出外 求学 的 美浓 子弟
